name: Journey to the Sun Valley Temple
name_original: Journey to the Sun Valley Temple
description:
Game made for Weakness Week.  I choose to work on Dialog.  I wrote a Dialog system and implemented dialog for the NPCs (and used it for some of the non-NPC interactions in the world).  I also took the opportunity to try out Unity's terrain system & wrote a simple First Person Controller.

Game has 4 different endings.

Controls:

  • WASD
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse -> Camera
  • Left Click Interact
  • ESC - Pause / Options Menu

Assets used:

  • Textures from https://texture.ninja
  • xNode
  • Items from Unity asset store
    • Crafting Mechanim Animation Pack Free
    • Cartoon Temple Building Kit
    • Low Poly Nature Pack Light
    • Hand Painted Grass Texture
